ref.title: Viscosity, Interfacial Tension, Density, and Refractive Index of Ionic Liquids [EMIM][MeSO3], [EMIM][MeOHPO2], [EMIM][OcSO4], and [BBIM][NTf2] in Dependence on Temperature at Atmospheric Pressure

title: Refraction, surface tension, and speed of sound: Refractive index (Na D-line)
